transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Hello.

Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: I am audible sir?
Executive: Yeah who is speaking?
Customer: Sir this side Shivani.
Executive: Shivani is this India Mart?
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Okay ma'am actually thoda kaam aisa tha mera ki aapke office se mujhe phone aaya tha ki subscription ke liye means renewal ke liye.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To unse mujhe bataya wo kam se kam ek mahina se mujhe follow up kar rahe the ki aap renewal kijiye renewal kijiye karke.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: To maine unko do teen bar bola tha ki aap mujhe previous jo maine kiya tha subscription uske sab details dijiye magar unhone kuch jyada detail mujhe diye nahi.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Fir battery ye hua hai ki unhone force kiya ki abhi aapka immediate khatam hone wala hai within four days three days and now you have to immediately renew.
Customer: So maine unko unhone payment link bhi bheja unko maine payment bhi kar diya.
Customer: Okay but now it's showing ki abhi mere che se saat mahine abhi baki hai wo subscription ke to unhone mujhe pura misguide karke galat bol ke mere se payment liya hai.
Customer: Now you please inform me where to contact where to report and what to do next.
Executive: Sir dekhiye agar aapse aise kuch as such kuch bol ke matlab payment aapka jaldi liya gaya hai ya fir jo bhi aap mujhe yaha pe bata rahe ho ki aapki jo expiry date hai wo aapki baki hai but aapse five to six months six or seven months jo bhi aap bata rahe ho us time pehle yaha pe liya gaya hai to yaha pe aapko kuch na kuch iska compensation diya jayega agar aisa hua hai.
Customer: Compensation in the sense?
Executive: Compensation in the sense aapse kya amount demand kiya hai unhone?
Customer: 67000 full two years extra jo next jo hai do years ka wo 67000 unhone mujhe kuch to offer kiya tha including GST discounted rate ya including GST wo pura amount unhone mere se liya hua hai.
Customer: To agar ye che mahine baki hai to mujhe mera full amount hi refund chahiye.
Customer: Kyunki kuch point hi nahi hai na che mahine pehle payment dene mein aapko.
Executive: Nahi aapka bhi point kahin na kahin bilkul theek hai aap jo cheez bol rahe ho bilkul theek hai aapki but sir dekhiye isme main aapko kuch as such kuch yaha pe kuch additional yaha pe main aapka add on kara deti hu.
Customer: Aap Udita madam ki baat kar rahi hai kya?
Executive: Ji nahi main Shivani baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Unki friend hi hogi na.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir actually main dusre department hu aur dusre department se.
Customer: Achcha theek hai no problem ji ji ji theek hai mujhe amount kuch bhi nahi chahiye.
Customer: Maine do hi terms rakhe the madam ke pass agar aapne mujhe galat keh ke ya misguide karke ya aisa kuch keh ke mere se payment liya hai aur wo aapki galti hai to aapko minimum five years subscription mujhe chahiye ye same rate mein okay agar ye nahi ho sakta hai to mujhe mera pura paisa wapis chahiye only two options you have.
Customer: Main aapka add on denge hum aapko whatsapp denge aapko extra leads denge I am not absolutely not interested in that.
Executive: Shree ji dekhiye main aapko ek cheez yaha pe samjhati hu main aapko ek cheez yaha pe batati hu yaha pe agar aap ji main aap mera ek bar mera point sun lijiye please agar yaha pe aap do saal ke liye jate ho to jo abhi ka price hai wo 94400 aapse liya gaya hai theek hai to jo price aapko yaha pe.
Customer: 94 nahi 67000 something.
Executive: Ji main abhi price aapko bata rahi hu jo exactly abhi ka price hai 94400 hai theek hai aapse jo liya gaya hai.
Customer: 80000 tha sir 80000 tha.
Executive: Sir including GST 94400 including excluding GST 80000 plus GST 14400 ki aapki GST hai isme theek hai.
Customer: Achcha okay theek hai okay boliye.
Executive: To ye yaha pe na aapka kuch amount adjust kiya gaya hai jo samay aapka bacha hua hai jo che mahine aap yaha pe ho.
Customer: What what what purpose?
Executive: Ye aapka amount bata rahi hu.
Customer: No no no don't ma'am you also trying to misguide me.
Executive: Nahi nahi misguide nahi kar rahi hu main aapko jo hai.
Customer: Absolutely ye mujhe bataya tha aapne ki aap che mahine pehle kar rahe hai isliye hum aapko discount de rahe hai ye bataya tha.
Executive: Nahi nahi ye cheez aapko inform nahi hai.
Customer: Ha to kuch point hi nahi hai na abhi aap che mahine abhi do saal ka bhi kijiye hum 20000 mein denge uske baad ki aur uske do saal ka bhi kijiye aap 5 rupay mein denge aise thodi hota hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi aapki baat sir main aapki baat se agree kar rahi hu us cheez ko deny nahi kar rahi hu us cheez ko main agree kar rahi hu ki jo cheeze hui hai wo galat hui hai.
Customer: Excuse me maine call kiya hai India Mart ke call center ko okay aap mujhe convince mat kijiye ki kya karna hai mujhe ye bataye aap being a call center person ki mujhe complaint kahan pe karna hai aur mujhe iske regarding kya kya karna hai mujhe mera paisa wapis lene ke liye mujhe aapke taraf se kuch bhi options nahi chahiye mujhe mera paisa wapis lene ke liye kya karna padega kis se baat karni padegi utna hi bata dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai koi baat nahi main aapko is cheez ke regarding kuch nahi bol rahi hu aapne call kiya hai ye recording line pe aapki call hai aapki call record ho rahi hai jo bhi cheeze aapne mujhe yaha pe boli hai wo yaha pe ho chuki hai to aap mujhe kisko contact karu.
Executive: Sir contact aapka ho chuka hai ab hamari team aapko contact karegi.
Customer: When when when when when.
Executive: Sir dekhiye isme 24 hours to aapke lagte hai but ha 24 hours hamari team.
Customer: Jab aapko jab aapko payment chahiye hota hai to din mein 40 messages karte hai 25 miss call karte hai tab 24 hours nahi lagte aapko aur abhi aapko agar paisa wapis dena hai to 24 hours lagte hai ye sarkari office hai kya?
Executive: Sir dekhiye thoda sa aap bhi patience rakhiye ab is cheez ke regarding.
Customer: Madam maine subah phone kiya tha yesterday just just just second yesterday evening I messaged her okay to today morning I called her till today there is no message and no call from her maine unko call kiya hai uske baad hi baat hui hai so abhi aapke pass paisa hai aapko kuch jarurat nahi padi hai mujhe contact karne se okay so mujhe hi karna padega jo bhi hai.
Executive: Shree sir dekhiye suniye sir agar refund bhi aapka hota hai sir aisa to hota nahi hai ki India Mart ko aapne scanner diya aur aapko refund ho gaya pura ek process hota hai us cheez ka aap please is cheez ko samajhiye.
Customer: So mujhe wahi batane ke liye jo bhi karte hai na unse hi mujhe baat karni hai I am telling you that that.
Executive: Sir ek aadmi nahi karta hai na aisa aapne yaha pe kiya hai ab yaha pe aapki complaint register hogi uske baad fir us registration ke baad aapke pass ek call aayegi then aapse baat hogi uske baad sir pura process hota hai.
Customer: Take your take your time take your time mujhe wo abhi jo complaint register hui hai na uska kuch details dijiye ki ye ye number ka aapka complaint number hai mujhe sab details dijiye to wo reference leke main wapis call karunga.
Executive: Okay hai okay sir.
Customer: Okay sir thank you that's good.
summary:
Concerns:

- Was misguided for subscription renewal.

- Payment taken despite months remaining on subscription.

- Wants a refund or 5-year subscription at same rate.



Resolution:

- Executive assured compensation will be provided.

- Explained the process for refund.



Next Steps: 

- Team will contact the customer within 24 hours.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, renewal, refund, misguidance
